title: Learning Center
subtitle: A complete meditation course from basic concepts to advanced techniques

basics.title: Basics - Understanding Meditation
basics.intro: Welcome to your meditation journey. In this chapter, we'll explore what meditation truly is, understand its scientific foundations, and prepare you for your first meditation experience.

breathing.title: Breathing - The Art of Breath
breathing.intro: Breath is the bridge between body and mind. Learning proper breathing techniques is an essential foundation for meditation practice.

focus.title: Focus - Training Attention
focus.intro: In an age of information overload, the ability to focus has become rare and valuable. Learn how to train and enhance your attention.

relaxation.title: Relaxation - Body & Mind
relaxation.intro: Learn various relaxation techniques to release physical tension and bring your mind back to a state of calm.

meditation.title: Meditation - Mindfulness Practice
meditation.intro: Explore different meditation methods and find the practice style that works best for you.

advanced.title: Advanced - Deep Exploration
advanced.intro: Dive into advanced meditation territories, build lasting practice habits, and integrate meditation into your daily life.
